channel.title: Shopping on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Shopping on TechnoStreet

item.title: Roku's Streaming Stick 4K hits a new low of $25, plus the rest of the week's best tech deals
item.description: Roku’s Streaming Stick 4K hits a new low of $25, plus the rest of the week’s best tech deals Black Friday doesn't officially arrive for a few more weeks, but we're already starting to see retailers run early holiday sales on several gadgets we recommend.

item.title: A store that sells Nothing will open in London this year
item.description: A store that sells Nothing will open in London this year Nothing only just released its first phone months ago, but that isn't stopping the company from establishing a physical retail presence.
